title: Man shot at Chesterfield apartment complex
content:
CHESTERFIELD COUNTY, Va. (WRIC) — Police responded to a shooting that occurred at a Chesterfield apartment complex Tuesday night.
Police were called at 8:50 p.m. and found a male shot in the leg at 4924 Burnt Oak Drive in the Ivy Walk apartment complex.
The man was transported to VCU Medical Center with non-life threatening injuries.
There is no suspect information at this time.
This is a developing story. Stay with 8News online and on air for the latest updates.
